about_the_game:
Important: The game is in Early Access

  • Chapter 1 is now available.
  • Chapter 2 to be released in Q4 2024.
  • Chapter 3 is planned for release in Q1 2025.
  • Chapter 4 is planned for release in Q3 2025.
  • We plan to release at least 4 chapters in total.
  • All Game Features listed below are already implemented into the game.
  • Both minor and major gameplay improvements are planned for the future.
  • Price of the game will increase with each released Chapter.

We read all your feedback and are very grateful for your help! <3



Enelia: Dawn of Madness is a mysterious adventure in a madness-infested world where every choice draws you deeper into the embrace of darkness. While the druids search for the heart of the world, the hearts of the Za'ani are shrouded in darkness, and madness takes on human forms.

Desperation brings you closer to enigmatic characters whose encounters change you. Each of them will lead you to answers, but will you want to know the truth?

How far will you go to touch the madness?



Game Features

- Enchanting Atmosphere: A stylish world inspired by "Avatar" with animated backgrounds and comics.
- Parallel Narrative Branches: Play as different characters and journey to distant corners of the world.
- Cinematic Storytelling: A manga-style novel filled with tension, mysteries, and dramatic events.
- Astral Vision: Explore hidden layers of reality and face madness.
- Dynamic Choices: Your decisions will influence the story's outcome and can lead to at least five different endings.



The world of Enelia, inspired by "Avatar" and "Stranger Things," contains countless mysteries and secrets, each of which can lead to unpredictable turns.

Enelia is a mystical adventure set in a vast, advanced bio-magical world with its own rules and laws, where love and madness are intricately intertwined by the thread of fate.

Every choice truly matters and has consequences.



Forge a strong bond with a beloved character or become their sworn enemy, do good and maintain harmony or embrace the path of darkness and plunge the world into chaos!

The choice is yours — flee from madness or delve into its very heart?



In search of salvation, Enelia explores a mysterious world with incredible natural phenomena, mythical creatures, ancient secrets, and dark cults. Embark on an adventure with Enelia and her pet Shio to gain the power of a druid and ascend to the top of the Dre'we.



Enelia: Dawn of Madness is an exciting adventure where your choices will determine whether you become a victim of madness or stop it. Along the way, you will encounter and build relationships with mysterious characters, face and fight mythical creatures, solve puzzles, and undertake quests leading to new revelations, but whatever you do, a confrontation with madness is inevitable.



We have poured our heart and soul into creating this game, striving to make it unique and memorable. We want every player to experience the heroes' stories alongside them and to be moved by the themes presented in the narrative.

short_description: Immerse yourself in the enigmatic world of Nauris, where enchanting landscapes hide terrifying secrets: the strange behavior of elders, sinister rituals of priests, and the disappearance of citizens. Madness lurks everywhere – will you master it or become its victim? The choice is yours.
